The Shu'erli Coal Mine is an underground coal mine operated by Datong Coal Mine Group Tongsheng Shu'erli Coal Industry Company

operators: Datong Coal Mine Group Tongsheng Shu'erli Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is fully owned by Datong Coal Mine Group Tongsheng Shu'erli Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Jinneng Group.
